pageContext.title: Challenges
pageContext.description:
If any player thinks the outcome of your narration is uncertain, they can challange you.
Meet the challenge by getting a hit via some other rule.
If you don't, whoever the challenger narrates the outcome instead.

back.name: Challenges
back.desc:
Resolve challenges according to the logic of the setting and the unfolding story.
If you're using GM role cards, use their guidance to help.
